name: Goblin Uprising
description:
The goblins have stolen a shipment of explosives and are heading this way!

Defend the base with honor, we will not retreat!

Don't rush your preparation.

Each task requires time, but planning is free.

To build, repair, and salvage, select the tool, then select a spot on the map.

Towers attack at range, but are not as tough as walls.

Walls are a tough barrier, resistant to damage.

Salvage trees and buildings for wood.
